result.name: national-marine-monitoring-programme-cruises-rv-cirolana-05-1997-station-data
result.notes:
A series of cruises were carried out in the North Sea, English Channel and 
Irish Sea between 1992 and 1997 by the Centre for Environment, Fisheries and 
Aquaculture Science to conduct monitoring studies at stations established 
under the UK National Monitoring Programme (NMP). Physical measurements were 
taken as well as the collection of samples for chemical and biological effects 
studies. This data consists of the station locations sampled in 1997, 
ancillary data recorded (e.g. salinity, temperature), and some analysis data 
of sediment and water bottle samples.

organization.name: marine-environmental-data-information-network
organization.title: Marine Environmental Data & Information Network
organization.description: MEDIN is a partnership of UK organisations committed to improving access to marine data. Our partners are both public and private sector.

result.title: National Marine Monitoring Programme Cruises - RV Cirolana 05/1997 Station Data

resources.description: The Cefas Data Portal contains metadata records and data sets available to download and connect to in support of our commitment to open science. Data is available in the following formats: CSV, ESRI Shapefile. The data can also be accessed via the WFS and WMS protocols.
resources.name: Cefas Data Portal
